verses: Love grows best in little moments, shared in everyday life.
Love is not about how much you say 'I love you,' but how much you prove that it's true.
True love is not something you find, it's something you build together.
A great relationship is about two things: first, appreciating the similarities, and second, respecting the differences.
Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
In relationships, it's the small things done with love that make the biggest difference.
A successful relationship requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
Love is not just looking at each other, it's looking in the same direction together.
The best relationships are the ones you never saw coming.
A strong relationship starts with two brave people who are ready to work through challenges together.
